content.en: CAF Analysis: Scientists have been using algorithms to investigate the role of cancer-associated fibroblasts (CAFs) in various types of cancer. By analyzing gene expression data and using machine learning techniques, these algorithms can predict prognosis, therapeutic responses, immune infiltration, and even refine cancer classifications. This research aims to better understand the impact of CAFs on tumor microenvironments and improve treatment strategies for cancer patients.
content.da: CAF-analyse: Forskere har brugt algoritmer til at undersøge rollen af cancer-associerede fibroblaster (CAF'er) i forskellige typer kræft. Ved at analysere genekspressionsdata og anvende maskinlæringsteknikker kan disse algoritmer forudsige prognose, terapeutiske responser, immuncelleinfiltration og endda præcisere kræftklassifikationer. Denne forskning sigter mod at opnå en bedre forståelse af CAF'ernes indflydelse på tumorens mikroomgivelser og forbedre behandlingsstrategier for kræftpatienter.
